org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.common

Class CassandraHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.common.CassandraHelper

  • public class CassandraHelper
extends Object
    Helper class providing methods to work with Cassandra session and exceptions

      • isKeyspaceAbsenceError

        public static boolean isKeyspaceAbsenceError(Throwable e)
        Checks if Cassandra keyspace absence error occur.
        Parameters:
        e - Exception to check.
        Returns:
        true in case of keyspace absence error.

      • isTableAbsenceError

        public static boolean isTableAbsenceError(Throwable e)
        Checks if Cassandra table absence error occur.
        Parameters:
        e - Exception to check.
        Returns:
        true in case of table absence error.

      • isHostsAvailabilityError

        public static boolean isHostsAvailabilityError(Throwable e)
        Checks if Cassandra host availability error occur, thus host became unavailable.
        Parameters:
        e - Exception to check.
        Returns:
        true in case of host not available error.

      • isPreparedStatementClusterError

        public static boolean isPreparedStatementClusterError(Throwable e)
        Checks if Cassandra error occur because of prepared statement created in one session was used in another session.
        Parameters:
        e - Exception to check.
        Returns:
        true in case of invalid usage of prepared statement.

      • isCassandraCompatibleTypes

        public static boolean isCassandraCompatibleTypes(Class type1,
                                 Class type2)
        Checks if two Java classes are Cassandra compatible - mapped to the same Cassandra type.
        Parameters:
        type1 - First type.
        type2 - Second type.
        Returns:
        true if classes are compatible and false if not.
